title: Film Industry Reader
text:
IMDB ratings have a skewed distribution, and they should not be used on a nominal scale. (Mondragon 2021).



Distribution of IMDB ratings


Online movie ratings are not perfect, but useful. A few ideas on how to make them more usable by Walt Hickey. (Hickey 2015).




Normalized rating distribution of 146 films in theatres in 2015 that had 30+ reviews on Fandango.com
